content: be a magical mermaid in this fun and sparkly mermaid scarf the finished scarf is one-size-fits-most for women/teens about 14 5 inches in length before fin and 29 inches in width at top / widest point to complete this pattern you will need a size i/9 5 25 mm crochet hook worsted weight weight category 4 yarn scissors and a yarn needle pattern includes full/detailed supplies list this pattern is in the english language written in standard american terms the difficulty level for this pattern is intermediate stitches you will need to know include the single_crochet double_crochet and single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together gauge 1 crocodile stitch across at widest point = about 1 5 inches and 2 crocodile stitches 4 row including 2dc cluster row = about 2 in length
